price: 24 Ils n’y trouveront ni fraîcheur, ni boisson désaltérante,
arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā bardan walā sharāban
